job_history.work_description: Supported physicians and nurses with updating work list and flowsheet information. Provided instructions to staff on the use of EPIC Care. Provided support during the go-live.

Study of Tera Spectra and Tera imaging. Analytical testing and method development and method validation. Maintenance and Calibration of Analytical Instruments such as HPLC, UPLC, UV, FT-IR, Dissolution apparatus, pH meter and analytical balances.

Determine their thickness profile. Analytical testing and method development and method validation. Confirming the ability of this technique to resolve small variations in Ti02 layer thickness and consequently adsorption.
Isolation, identification, Bioprocessing and characterization of secondary metabolites from the soil screened microorganism. Screening of soil actinomycetes from the different soil samples.

skills.name: Analytical Testing
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in analytical testing and method development across various research roles, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Method Development
skills.explanation: Developed and validated methods for analytical testing in multiple research roles, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Instrument Calibration
skills.explanation: Maintained and calibrated analytical instruments such as HPLC, UPLC, UV, FT-IR, and pH meter, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Research and Development
skills.explanation: Conducted research in various fields, including Tera Spectra and Tera imaging, and secondary metabolites, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Bioprocessing
skills.explanation: Isolated, identified, and characterized secondary metabolites from microorganisms, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: EPIC Systems
skills.explanation: Provided support during the go-live of EPIC Care and supported staff with updating work list and flowsheet information, showing some practical experience.

skills.name: Team Collaboration
skills.explanation: Provided instructions to staff on the use of EPIC Care, indicating some practical experience in team collaboration.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed data from various research projects, including thickness profile determination and analytical testing, showing a solid working proficiency.
